title: Universal Horizon Address - Official Implementation
description: Frame-agnostic coordinate encoding system for cosmological objects. Patent US 63/902,536. Implementation details protected under trade secret and patent law. Reproducibility manifest and binary distributions included. Source code will remain private until patent grant. All results independently verifiable via cryptographic checksums and reproducibility manifest.
notes:
Binary implementation available via: pip install uha-official

Source code protected by:
- US Provisional Patent 63/902,536 (filed 2024)
- Trade secret (All Your Baseline LLC)

Reproducibility guaranteed via:
- Cryptographic SHA-256 checksums
- Version-locked manifest files
- Reproducible build system
- Example code in public repository

For licensing inquiries: eric.martin1@wsu.edu
references: Martin, E.D. (2025). The NASA Paper & Small Falcon Algebra. Zenodo. DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.17172694
Martin, E.D. (2025). Resolving the Hubble Tension through Conservative Uncertainty Propagation. In preparation.
